meta.description: Vistara UI Component Library Index - מערכת חיפוש וניהול רכיבים

CompactTaskCard.description: Displays a compact view of a task with status indicators and action buttons

TasksTable.description: Full-featured task management table with CRUD operations, filtering, sorting, and transfer capabilities

TokenUsageMonitor.description: Real-time token usage monitoring with detailed insights and cost tracking

AgentCard.description: Agent status monitoring card with real-time health tracking and performance indicators

SystemHealthDashboard.description: Comprehensive system health dashboard with resource monitoring and performance metrics

BackupStatusCard.description: Comprehensive backup monitoring dashboard with storage usage and activity tracking
